issue.title: [Python] Empty table creation from schema with nested dictionary type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8196](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8196). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up on ARROW-6872 / https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6698, creating an empty table from a schema in python (`Schema.empty_table()`) still fails with a nested dictionary type (eg a list of dictionaty type).
